name: Walkthrough Guide for Adam Wolfe
description:
Stuck playing Adam Wolfe? We have you covered!

The Strategy Guide contains all the advice, references, and instructions you could possibly need to complete Mad Head Games' first indie title! With annotated screenshots from actual gameplay, this guide is the perfect companion - whether you use it for the more challenging bits of the game or from the start to finish.

Features:

- the flow of gameplay from beginning to end;
- all the puzzle solutions;
- a comprehensive, step-by-step set of instructions.


Be our fan on Facebook: www.facebook.com/madheadgames/

Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/madheadgames

Visit us: www.madheadgames.com
